column4: At what point do you lose video output? Do you see "Starting Linux..." after the boot menu?
a pretty old one too :P an athlon 4 1.17 ghz

When the PC boots, press ESCape to get the boot menu, then highlight the kernel entry you want to start, press "e" to edit it, then choose the line that starts "kernel=" and press "e" again, edit the end of the line to remove "quiet splash", press Enter, then press "b" to boot
